```{r}
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(brms, tidyverse)

### DATA ###
saved <- read_csv("Results/saved_results_real.csv") %>% 
  mutate(
    "b_sex_cond_dist" = abs(b_sex_cond_med-(boot::inv.logit(true_sex_cond)-boot::inv.logit(true_base))),
    "cot" = str_extract(analysis_type, "[a-z]+_[a-z]+"),
    "cot" = ifelse(cot == "pp_linear", 0, 1), #cot: 0 = linear, 1 = citation
    "cot" = as.factor(cot),
    "pb" = ifelse(is.na(pub_method), 0, 1),
    "pb" = as.factor(pb)
  )
meta <- read_csv("Results/meta_results_real.csv") %>% 
  mutate(
    "abs_dist_pp_l" = abs(meta_sex_cond_estimate_pp_l-(boot::inv.logit(meta_true_sex_cond)-boot::inv.logit(meta_true_base))),
    "abs_dist_pp_l_pb_sym" = abs(meta_sex_cond_estimate_pp_l_pb_sym-(boot::inv.logit(meta_true_sex_cond)-boot::inv.logit(meta_true_base))),
    "abs_dist_pp_l_pb_asym" = abs(meta_sex_cond_estimate_pp_l_pb_asym-(boot::inv.logit(meta_true_sex_cond)-boot::inv.logit(meta_true_base))),
    "abs_dist_pp_c" = abs(meta_sex_cond_estimate_pp_c-(boot::inv.logit(meta_true_sex_cond)-boot::inv.logit(meta_true_base))),
    "abs_dist_pp_c_pb_sym" = abs(meta_sex_cond_estimate_pp_c_pb_sym-(boot::inv.logit(meta_true_sex_cond)-boot::inv.logit(meta_true_base))),
    "abs_dist_pp_c_pb_asym" = abs(meta_sex_cond_estimate_pp_c_pb_asym-(boot::inv.logit(meta_true_sex_cond)-boot::inv.logit(meta_true_base)))
  )

```

### All true effects

```{r}
### with only last expt
saved_exp60 <- saved %>% filter(expt == 60) %>% 
  mutate(
    "repeat_id_u" = ifelse(true_sex_cond<0, abs(true_sex_cond*300)+repeat_id, (true_sex_cond*100)+repeat_id)
  )

mf_h1 <- bf( b_sex_cond_dist| se(b_sex_cond_error) ~ 0 + pb:cot+  (1 + pb:cot | repeat_id_u))

get_prior(mf_h1, data = saved_exp60, family = gaussian())

h1_prior <- c(
  prior(normal(0,.5), class = b)
)

h1_m0 <- brm(
  mf_h1,
  data = saved_exp60,
  family = gaussian(),
  prior = h1_prior,
  sample_prior = "only",
  chains = 2,
  cores = 2, 
  iter = 4000
)

pp_check(h1_m0, nsamples = 100)

h1_m1 <- brm(
  mf_h1,
  data = saved_exp60,
  family = gaussian(),
  prior = h1_prior,
  sample_prior = T,
  chains = 2,
  cores = 2, 
  iter = 4000
)

pp_check(h1_m1, nsamples = 100)

summary(h1_m1)

hypothesis(h1_m1,"pb0:cot0<pb0:cot1") # linear chain has smaller error than citation chain
hypothesis(h1_m1,"pb0:cot0+pb0:cot1<pb1:cot0+pb1:cot1") # smaller error in simulation without pb than with pb
hypothesis(h1_m1,"pb0:cot0<pb1:cot0")
hypothesis(h1_m1,"pb0:cot1<pb1:cot1")
hypothesis(h1_m1,"pb1:cot0<pb1:cot1") # citation chain are more affected by pb than linear
```
